TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ActivatedClientTypeEntry extends System.Runtime.Remoting.TypeEntry

summary.span: 将在客户端注册的对象类型的值保存为可以在服务器上激活的类型。

span.span: Holds values for an object type registered on the client end as a type that can be activated on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要在客户端上创建客户端激活的对象的实例，你必须知道其 ，并且必须使用方法在客户端上注册它 。To create an instance of a client-activated object on the client, you must know its and it must be registered on the client by using the method. 若要为客户端激活的对象的新实例获取代理，客户端必须首先向注册通道 ，然后通过调用来激活该对象 `new` 。To obtain a proxy for a new instance of the client-activated object the client must first register a channel with and then activate the object by calling `new`. 若要使用关键字激活客户端激活的对象类型 `new` ，必须先使用方法在客户端上注册对象类型 。To activate a client-activated object type with the `new` keyword, you must first register the object type on the client using the method. 调用时， 将为远程处理基础结构提供尝试创建远程应用程序的位置 `new` 。By calling you are giving the remoting infrastructure the location of the remote application where `new` attempts to create it. 另一方面，如果使用 方法来创建客户端激活的对象的新实例，则必须提供远程应用程序的 URL 作为参数，因此，在客户端上注册之前不需要。If, on the other hand, you use the method to create a new instance of the client-activated object, you must supply the remote application's URL as a parameter, so no prior registration on the client end is necessary. 若要为该 方法提供要在其上创建对象的服务器的 url，则必须将该 url 封装在类的实例中 。To supply the method with the URL of the server on which you want to create the object, you must encapsulate the URL in an instance of the class. 有关客户端激活的对象和远程对象激活的详细说明，请参阅 [激活远程对象](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/cbzcxy2s(v=vs.100))。For a detailed description of client activated objects and remote object activation see [Activation of Remote Objects](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/cbzcxy2s(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 注册客户端激活的远程对象。The following code example shows how to use a to register a client activated remote object. 该示例包含三个部分：客户端、服务器和客户端和服务器使用的远程对象。The example contains three parts, a client, a server, and a remote object used by the client and server. 下面的代码示例演示客户端：The following code example shows a client: [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.ActivatedClientTypeEntry#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.ActivatedClientTypeEntry/CPP/activatedclienttypeentry_client.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.ActivatedClientTypeEntry#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.ActivatedClientTypeEntry/CS/activatedclienttypeentry_client.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.Remoting.ActivatedClientTypeEntry#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.ActivatedClientTypeEntry/VB/activatedclienttypeentry_client.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示了此客户端的服务器：The following code example shows a server for this client: [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.ActivatedClientTypeEntry#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.ActivatedClientTypeEntry/CPP/activatedclienttypeentry_server.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.ActivatedClientTypeEntry#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.ActivatedClientTypeEntry/CS/activatedclienttypeentry_server.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.Remoting.ActivatedClientTypeEntry#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.ActivatedClientTypeEntry/VB/activatedclienttypeentry_server.vb#10)] 下面的代码示例提供了客户端和服务器使用的远程对象：The following code example provides the remote object used by the client and the server: summary.span: 获取或设置客户端激活类型的上下文特性。

span.span: Gets or sets the context attributes for the client-activated type.

span.span: The context attributes for the client activated type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前未实现此索引器，对其执行的操作不会产生任何结果。Currently, this indexer is not implemented and operations on it will not produce any results. 特性提供上下文属性，在将其添加到时 ，可以强制执行同步或事务等策略。 attributes provide context properties that, when added to a , can enforce policies such as synchronization or transactions.
